steps.name: Clicked Save button to create policy
Navigated to Cloud Agent Download Page
Clicked on Install Cloud Agent button for policy: RZDHSZRMRG
Pinged VM to ensure it's reachable
Copied installer to VM using PsExec
Started Cloud product installation on VM
Waited extra 100 seconds for system load
Retry 1: Cloud Agent not found yet
Retry 2: Cloud Agent not found yet
Product not found after reboot: Cloud Agent
Verified product status from Computers Page
Checked task row for uninstall status
Verified: Application has been uninstalled successfully
